In England, in the seven days to 08 July, there were 174,961 new confirmed cases (309.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 July, there were 140,409 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 25% (34,552 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 July is 19,436,864 (34,371 cases per 100,000 population).
